greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Length of the longest partition of n into distinct parts, with each part divisible by the next one.
reference: V. A. Sadovnichiy, A. A. Grigoryan and S. V. Konyagin (1987), "Problems of mathematical olympiads for university students". Section 4.1, problem 25. (in Russian)
program: (PARI) { a(n,m=0) = local(r=0); if(n==0,return(0)); fordiv(n,d, if(d<=m,next); r=max(r,1+a((n-d)\d,1)) ); r }
results.author: _Max Alekseyev_, Nov 13 2009, Nov 15 2009
